name: .SMV File Extension
summary: Learn about .SMV files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Video format used for recording video conferences and transmitting videos via e-mail; supported by several types of Chinese portable media players such as the TRIO Onyx Portable Media Player and the Global Sources Direct MP4 Player; also supported by the Philips GoGear Vibe media player.

content: NOTE: The SMV format is a proprietary video format and is not supported by most video players.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
